me.Salt.SaltAPI

Class ConfigurationImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Salt.SaltAPI.ConfigurationImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConfiguration

    public class ConfigurationImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConfiguration
    This class acts as the root of the bot's API. It stores information related to the bot, and is used to control the bot's operation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface me.Salt.SaltAPI.IConfiguration

        IConfiguration.Authority

        A HashMap of User IDs, and their respective JGuild instances.

      • staff

        private java.util.HashMap<net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.User,java.util.List<IConfiguration.Authority>> staff
        A HashMap of Users, and their respective IConfiguration.Authority. Note: Users not assigned an authority will not be in this HashMap.

      • commands

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,ICommand> commands
        A HashMap storing command names, and the respective implementation of ICommand.

      • jUserList

        @Expose
private java.util.List<JUser> jUserList
        A list of registered JUsers

      • jGuildList

        @Expose
private java.util.List<JGuild> jGuildList
        A list of registered JGuilds

      • debugMode

        private boolean debugMode
        A boolean representing if the bot should run in debug mode. In debug mode, the bot produces a lot more console output, and states what is being performed at every stage of operation.

      • embedColour

        private java.awt.Color embedColour
        The default colour for an embed. This colour is chosen as the colour for an embed if a guild, textchannel or user doesn't specify a different colour.

      • commandCount

        @Expose
private int commandCount
        An integer representing how many commands are registered. This is calculated and updated after the registration of a command.

      • messageCount

        @Expose
private int messageCount
        An integer representing how many messages have been received by the bot.

      • permissionHandler

        private PermissionHandler permissionHandler
        An instance of PermissionHandler.

      • roadmap

        private java.util.List<RoadItem> roadmap
        A list of registered roadmap items.

      • languageHandler

        private LanguageHandler languageHandler
        An instance of LanguageHandler.

      • defaultLangCode

        private LangCode defaultLangCode
        An instance of LangCode representing what the default language is.
